name: Cafépalypse
description:
It's the end of the world - and you run the only known coffee shop. The only problem? You have no idea who you are or how you got there, and it's going to cost you £10,000 to get out. Can you run a successful coffee shop during the apocalypse and earn your freedom before it's too late?

ControlsW A S DMoves the player1 2 3Make dialogue choices
Bugs

If you find any bugs in the game, please let me know in the comments on this page. Be sure to include what happened, what you were expecting to happen, and anything else you think might be important.

Coffee

If you like what you see and would like to encourage me to make more games, why not buy me a coffee. You can do so by clicking here?
